Name: zul-iqembulezifundi
Author: Iqembu Lezifundiswa, Mussa Muhammad Telela , Uthman Mfanafuthi Msomi, Moulana Abdur Rahman Chilipa, Haji Ibrahim Mondli Japhet Mthembu, Moulana Imran Ngcobo, Moulana Eshaaq Osman
Source: Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africa(IDM), https://www.alqurantranslation.com/

Translations.Text: Ngaphandle kwalabo abakholwayo futhi abenza izenzo ezinhle ezilungileyo futhi abayalana ngeqiniso futhi abayalana ngokubekezela
Ucabanga ukuthi ingcebo yakhe iyomenza ukuthi ahlale ingunaphakade
Futhi yini ekwenza wazi ukuthi yini umlilo wesihogo
Awuzange ubone yini ukuthi iNkosi yakho yabenza kanjani abanikazi bezindlovu
Ayizange yini idunge icebo labo na
Futhi (iNkosi yakho) yathumela phezu kwabo iqulu lezinyoni
Ngakho-ke yabenza kwaba sengathi bawutshani obudliwe (yimfuyo)
